mean_cn: n. 奠基者，创始人，创建者，缔造者
mean_en: a person who creates or establishes something that is meant to last for a long time (such as a business or school) :a person who founds something
short_phrase: a founder of the United States
sentence: Ben Franklin was one of the founders of the American Republic.
sentence_trans: 本·富兰克林是美国的奠基人之一。
